summary: Filmmaker Matthew Heineman examines the state of the ongoing drug problem along the U.S.-Mexican border.
cast: Tim Nailer Foley|José Manuel 'El Doctor' Mireles|Paco Valencia|Chaneque|Caballo|Enrique Peña Nieto|Ana Valencia|Estanislao Beltránin|Janet Fields|Nicolás Sierra|Karla|Alfredo Castillo Cervantes|María Imilse Arrué|Shawn Wilson
title: Tierra de cárteles
